entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Potential Deadlock in GC Allocate via RhpNewArray #105780
  • System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests.CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates failed #105778
  • Avoid building `StringBuilder` in `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler` #105775
  • DefineUninitializedData on TypeBuilder in System.Reflection.Emit uses typeof(ValueType) internally even when using a MetadataLoadContext #105772
  • Provide API to allow JSON converters/types to describe their associated JSON schema #105769
    10.0.0
  • iOS: HttpClient threads don't finish #105767
  • Improve the perf of `Complex <op> double` #105759
    10.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] BigInteger tests running out-of-memory #105753
  • Regex internal static cache: new regex instances are treated as 'oldest' ones and removed after cache is full (LRU may not work) #105748
  • Implement support for a modern password hashing algorithm #105745
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `WhereIn` and `WhereInBy` LINQ operators #105743
  • Using UnsafeAccessorAttribute throws BadImageFormatException on .NET9-preview6 #105738
  • Arm64/Sve: Sve_Multiply tests failing #105736
    9.0.0
  • InterpPgoTests.FirstRunGeneratesTableAndSecondRunLoadsIt failing #105733

Closed

  • JIT: Flow Graph Modernization and Improved Block Layout #93020
    10.0.0
  • Intel architecture improvements for .NET 9 #93196
    9.0.0
  • RuntimeBinder: A field being used after checking it for null #94184
  • Placing DAM on a Type array crashes illink #104761
    9.0.0
  • Cannot use CryptoStream with read-only stream #105592
    Future
  • Test failure: profiler/gc/nongcheap/nongcheap.sh #105005
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][hotreload] Cannot build `ApplyUpdateReferencedAssembly` with source link #62618
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'estimatedSize >= actualSize' during 'Emit code' #105693
    9.0.0
  • Allow `DefaultValueAttribute` with primitives when `System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.IsSupported` disabled #103542
    9.0.0
  • Debugging not working with self-contained single file .NET6 assemblies #84428
    10.0.0
  • Suspected CodeGen Bug in a User-Defined AsyncMethodBuilder #104274
  • [API Proposal]: Migrate `HybridCache` from aspnet to runtime #100290
    9.0.0
  • Using Raylib APIs in Blazor WebAssembly #96384
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad constant folding with `ShiftLogicalVariable` #105742
    9.0.0
  • Access violation in CEEInfo::getCallInfo #105710
  • Possible storage leak in nethost.cpp #50146
    Future
  • HttpRequestException Lacks StatusCode Information on ProxyTunnelError #105546
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide tunnel status code for proxy exceptions #66329
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 7 Regressions on 12/12/2023 12:38:01 AM #96030
    9.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 14 Apr 2023 #85451
    9.0.0
  • [Perf][Mono] Linux/x64 Regressions due to rewritten of Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 #80569
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'tree->OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR)' during 'Mark local vars' #105669
    9.0.0
  • vsdbg quits when resuming from a breakpoint if stepping over a line that throws an exception #95189
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Runtime crash in full AOT mode when using `LiteDB` #91332
    9.0.0
  • [mono][maccatalyst] MacCatalyst template app crashes in AOT+interp mode in .NET 8 #105510
    8.0.x
  • [iOS][non-icu] Clean up ICU related files from runtime pack #99521
    9.0.0
  • DeflateStream: reading to buffer error #105744
  • Question: Process.PrivateMemorySize64 - Differences between Debian/Ubuntu vs Alpine based images #100760
  • Name parsing in System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive #105729

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][debug] Fixing AV on accessing source_file_list that is NULL #105781
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix copy constructor injection for unsafe value classes #105779
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: Add out-of-bounds fallback for AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogical #105777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #105776
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 9.0.0
  • Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on Char and Rune #105773
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix IntelliSense for gc.cpp #105768
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #105765
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add [DebuggerDisplay] to CancellationTokenSource #105764
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Update Android App Maui rollback generation #105763
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Workaround bug in EvtFormatMessage #105762
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Add support for doubly nested intrinsic classes #105761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make Select_LargeNumber_Succcess exclusive #105751
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug
  • [NRBF] Don't use Unsafe.As when decoding DateTime(s) #105749
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Fix failing tests for GatherVectorByteOffsets (#105568) #105747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Assign latest virtual timestamp for added node to enable LRU manner of RegexCache #105746
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Implement DFEATURE_EMULATE_SINGLESTEP for LA64. #105741
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Add gcinfodumper related implementation. #105740
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/8.0-staging] Stop building AppHost in native AOT testing #105739
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix conditional select for Zeroing predicates (#102904) #105737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Use IndexOf for bounded loops in a regex code gen" #105735
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Eventpipe block unregister for callbacks #105734
    area-Tracing-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix check for types interesting to dataflow #105642
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix race condition in nongcheap.cpp test #105658
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add missing break statement #104286
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm][hotreload] Add explanation to workaround for build `ApplyUpdateReferencedAssembly` with source link #105758
    arch-wasm, area-EnC-mono, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that we add the broadcast and mask flags prior to computing the instruction size #105757
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Alphabetically order the SVE API (#104834) #105760
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support [DefaultValue] when new feature switch is disabled #105766
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Adjust IP after an AV during an STEP with FEATURE_EMULATE_SINGLESTEP enabled #105633
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Do not separate header comments from function definitions #105754
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Update generated ILLink analyzer tests #105643
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Enable some reflection emit tests on Mono #105662
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix constant folding for shift SIMD operators #105752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging when JMC is enabled #105756
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Store status code in exception for ProxyTunnelError #105610
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Skip `GT_LCL_FLD` stress if `GTF_VAR_CONTEXT` is set #105726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Condition dwarfdebug on WasmNativeDebugSymbols #105727
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][wbt] Fix `InvalidOperationException: There is no currently active test` #105561
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-browser
  • Add timeout to QuicConnectionTests for StreamsAvailable tests #105699
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser][MT] show progress in problematic unit tests #105680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V,QEMU] Disable execution of two corefx tests on QEMU #105689
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution

Updated

  • Partial re-revert of #104336. Only JIT fixes are included. #105596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Add Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout implementation #105672
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasi] wasi:http + WasiHttpHandler #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT: Added SVE GetFfr, SetFfr, LoadVectorFirstFaulting, GatherVectorFirstFaulting #105595
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement basic (recommended against) support for inheriting from COM interfaces defined in different assemblies #105119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Convert exception throwing JIT helpers to managed code. #105671
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow explicitly implemented ISimdVector APIs to be handled as intrinsic #104983
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 10.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] http streaming request server error #105709
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2506404 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `Guid` #105654
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • More IR validations in HIR #105630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix problem in ReadyToRun_TypeGenericInfoMap::HasConstraints #105728
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Automatically export '__managed__Main' when needed #105353
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix PHI non-null pattern #104493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Check for potential store-to-load forwarding before reordering ldr -> ldp #105695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Reapply "Remove zlib from requirements script and instruction files"" #105450
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression, blocked, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, blocked, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Marshalling of resolved Tasks/promises is not resolved in JS/C# #105464
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add missing tests for LoadVector*() #105703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add missing test coverage for invalid immediate (#104809) #105677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove support for older LLVM versions, and re-order linker flags #105110
    area-Build-mono
  • Normalize markdown links #105147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Remove short branches #105386
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Publishing is broken #2640

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Performance] Build perf regressions in MVC projects #42487
  • `dotnet workload restore` installs "aspire" though it isn't needed or wanted #42486
  • `dotnet workload restore` has odd logging and ignores logging switches #42485
  • JsonPropertyPostAction could normalize file name path #42484
  • Support ValueTuple in `<Using />` element #42479
  • Implicit restore in `pack` and `publish` should not restore projects with IsPackable=false and IsPublishable=false #42476

Closed

  • CLI - `dotnet workload restore` fails on solution if there is a .dcproj for Docker #42394
    9.0.1xx
  • Clean up our System.Text.Json references #39902

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42488
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Don't require AppHost when publishing AOT #42478
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Remove the corext overlay packages as they're not used anymore as far as we know #42326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update to the final net7 release #42471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • skip projects that don't support workloads during workload restore #42467
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Main] Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24380.1 #42472
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions" #42481
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop generating precomputed rar cache #42385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add -pack support for the build CLI so that the zips/msi/packages aren't built by default #42384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24380.1 #42469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable specifying install search location options for published `apphost` #42455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [] matches string and byte[] in overload resolution, but it can't be a string #8326

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread on nullable sources #74624
  • Go to definitiion not working. #74621
  • Collection expressions use `AddRange` instead of manual `foreach` in presence of a struct enumerator #74615
  • Code issues #74614
  • XML documentation cref to method with nullable array parameter should not produce warnings CS1584 and CS1658 #74613
  • No warning on use of static variable before initialization #74612

Closed

  • Multiple compiler servers running (and consuming CPU) on Linux #74607
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35130.81 #74611

PullRequests

Created

  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Tag PRs where any file matches the specified patterns #74622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in SymbolKey.ResolveString #74618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce overhead for resolving SymbolKey special types #74617
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Reduce allocations in AbstractStructureTaggerProvider.GetMultiLineRegions #74619
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move existing RemoveWhere code into an extension method on ArrayBuilder #74620
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move 'use auto prop' check earlier #74616
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations during SourceText serialization #74608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Change SyntaxEquivalence.AreEquivalent to use a more appropriate pooling mechanism for the stack it uses to walk trees. #74610
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce Roslyn packages impact on UI thread #74501
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Non-nullable form parameters should be marked `required` in the generated OpenAPI #57112
  • [Blazor] Some of the default UI styling is not accessible in dark mode #57111
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes #57110
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware, json_middleware #57109
  • Unable to build and run aspnetcore unit tests on RHEL 8/arm64 #57104
  • Better integration between ASP.NET Core auth handlers and Blazor Server / Wasm #57103
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Auto render mode - can not write cookie inside controller #57102
  • [Blazor] Monaco Editor breaks when navigating back and forth with per page rendermode #57100
  • Idea: Blazor inline component #57099
    Backlog
  • connection Abort + Dispose crashes process #57098
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes_dapper #57093

Closed

  • Consumes attribute/filter in controller-based web app does not set MIME type with the value specified #57090
  • [Https] `dotnet dev-certs --trust` support on Linux #32842
    9.0.0
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #57094
  • Perf regression: plaintext_spring #57089
  • RequestStream’s `Flush` should not throw #57064
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24366.3] .NET 8 Blazor Web App(WebAssembly) get an error: "TypeError: ar.monoStringToStringUnsafe is not a function" when are running with .NET 9 #56846
  • services.AddSession throws System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException #57097
  • Perf regression: fortunes #57075
  • Perf improvement: mvc #57088
  • SignalR Streaming Channel cancellation issue #57051
  • [9.0-preview7] Response schema being returned as IResult #56975
    9.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • [8.0] Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #57108
    Servicing-consider, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix AzDO area path for policy violations reporting #57105
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add client span to SignalR .NET client #57101
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Try to reduce IIS test event log flakiness #57028
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Add remarks to FromBodyAttrbiute #56997
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-rc1
  • Optimize new use of Base64Url #57050
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Make Stream.Flush no-op on read-only streams #57079
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • [release/2.1] Create tsaoptions.json #57106
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Fixes for OpenAPI document generation with M.E.ApiDescription.Server #57096
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, feature-openapi, 9.0-rc1
  • Fix up handling for awaitable IResults in ApiExplorer #57068
    area-mvc, 9.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9ff2450` to `5bcb2d7` #56999
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • Add some HPackDecoderTests for empty header names and values #57032
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Restrict permissions to the dev cert directory #56985
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Add Blazor Web Endpoints to the endpoint data source #57086
    area-blazor
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Upgrade yarn dependencies #57092
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fix up nullability and form schema handling in OpenAPI #56957
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
  • Add option to specify custom OpenAPI output file name like Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Cli #56974
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Propagate trace parent to SignalR hub invocations #57049
    area-signalr
  • [release/8.0] Update Microsoft.IO.Redist dependency #57006
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet stack hangup on trying to get the stackframes of a stuck process #4826

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FlexLayout height does not include child padding when AlignItems is Center #23956
  • widgets #23953
  • SemaphoreSlim Release hangs on iOS #23952
  • [Android] Frame disappears when assigning GradientStops to LinearGradientBrush inside this Frame #23951
  • Blazor + Web App template produces version mismatch warning #23946
  • BottomNavigationView ItemSelected EventHandler #23942
  • Contacts on Windows #23940
    Backlog
  • Activity client record must not be null to execute transaction item #23939
  • The target object with name 'ExpandCollapseChevronIcon' could not be resolved for a Setter. #23938
  • RadioButton not visible on iOS - ContentPage #23937
  • The bug of LinearItemLayout for CollectionView #23936
  • When the Border control is in RelativeLayout, RelativeLayout is not work correctly from 8.0.60 SR6 #23934

Closed

  • Maui Blazor app freezes after pressing back button on Android. #22819
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • MAUI Blazor app: Stops working after connecting with bluetooth keyboard #23916
    Backlog
  • MAUI app throwing error after enabling Linker #23954
  • What's the team currently working on? 💻 #11540
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [9.0.1xx-preview7] Merge 9.0 into 9.0.1xx-preview7 #23957
  • Added condition in WindowStateManager for selecting proper scene used #23945
    area-essentials, community ✨

Merged

  • [net9.0] Add `Window.Activate()` #23873
    community ✨, area-controls-window, Under Consideration
  • [iOS/MacCatalyst] CollectionViewHandler2 with compositional layout API's #23928
    area-controls-collectionview
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Obsolete legacy measure calls #23948
    area-layout
  • Obsolete legacy measure calls #23899
    area-layout
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Bump to latest 8.0.1xx-sr7 #23947
    area-infrastructure
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 9 Preview 7 #23927
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] [android] update AOT profile for .NET 9 Preview 7 #23941
  • [net9.0] Revert arcade net9 #23931
  • [net9.0] Update preview7 packages #23809
    9.0-preview7
  • [net9.0] Merge `main` into `net9.0` #23890
  • [ci] Revert arcade version bump #23930

Updated

  • Updating Maui templates to build unpackaged Windows apps by default #23787
    area-templates
  • Build the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure
  • [draft][XAML] `OnPlatform` doesn't work with `AppThemeBinding` in Release mode #23798
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Obsolete the old mechanism for registrations #23723
    area-core-hosting
  • Fix android image source switch through skip invalidation #23830
    community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [Binding SG] Enable usage of private fields and properties in SetBinding path #23810
    area-xaml
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
    9.0-rc1
  • [Windows] Register focus events for controls that can receive focus #23885
    platform/windows 🪟, area-core-hosting, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Android] SecureStorage: Rework logic to delete shared prefs when key is corrupt #23850
    area-essentials
  • [iOS] Shadow for clipped visual element #23872
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fixed low quality images in Resizetizer #23924
    area-single-project, community ✨
  • [android] improve performance of `ImageHandler.PlatformArrange()` #23665
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-image, t/perf
  • Always return Granted for Read-Write Storage permissions on Android #23909
    area-essentials
  • Fix Android ImageView flickering between images and drawable disappearing when shell section is removed from FragmentManager #23313
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support EF.Constant for Cosmos #34327
  • Block nested collections in relational provider for EF9 #34324
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Cosmos: block collections over value-converted elements #34218
    9.0.0
  • AOT/Query: for queries with JSON, interceptors generate code with labels that are not uniquified #34056
    9.0.0
  • Net 8 Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Invalid object name #34322

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing ConditionalTheory Attribute to Delete_FromSql_converted_to_subquery #34326
  • Block nested primitive collections in relational due to lack of query support #34325

Merged

  • Block collections of scalars with converters on Cosmos #34307
  • Fix to #34056 - AOT/Query: for queries with JSON, interceptors generate code with labels that are not uniquified #34323
  • Addressing API review feedback #34321

Updated

  • Change default compat level to 150 #34319
  • New EF.Constant handling #34297
  • Support vector search on Cosmos DB #33991
  • Handle projections of nested owned entity in Cosmos #34315
